content.raw:
You're correct, the sensor publisher would move to a new machine. But the subscriber shouldn't care about where the messages are coming from, right? I just checked with @caguero and ign-transport supports this use case for both topics and services.

I think the real challenge will be to synchronize the transition and make sure that there's a single publisher / service at a time.
